ValidationRule.description: Cannot change approval change from draft or approved for CQ VZW quotes
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin) ), CQ_eQuote__c , Quote_Type__c = 'CQ', OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ), 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ), 'Approved') ), ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ), OR( Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Accepted', Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Closed (Won)', AND(Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Rebid', CQ_isRebid_Done__c = false) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "Approval Stage" cannot be changed manually from the stage "Draft" or "Approved" to "Accepted", "Closed (Won)" or "Rebid" for a Verizon Quote. Please use the "Rebid" button to rebid
